content: mock rib fingerless mittens by jacqueline henderson these are beautiful fingerless mittens that use the magic loop to knit in the round there is a difference in the right and left mitten in the placement of the thumb it showcases a nice mock ribbing for the cuff and up the side of the mittens giving it just enough decorative flare complete step by step video instructions on how to knit these mittens can be viewed here https //youtu be/z6lyrxvplvw if you need some assistance on knitting in the round with the magic loop you can view my instructional video on that method here https
